name: Define Project Scope
description: Clearly articulate the boundaries, objectives, and deliverables of the 'Porn projects' initiative, establishing what is included and excluded from the project.
purpose: Establishes a foundational understanding and agreement on the project's extent, preventing scope creep and ensuring focus.
applicability_notes: Essential for any project, regardless of domain, to set clear expectations from the outset.
examples_of_usage: Initiating a new software development cycle

name: Identify Key Stakeholders
description: Determine and list all individuals, groups, or entities that have an interest in or will be affected by the 'Porn projects', including their roles and influence.
purpose: Ensures all relevant parties are identified early, facilitating communication, buy-in, and risk management.
applicability_notes: Crucial for projects involving multiple parties or external dependencies.

name: Establish Success Metrics
description: Define measurable criteria that will be used to evaluate the success and completion of the 'Porn projects'.
purpose: Provides a clear benchmark for evaluating project outcomes and ensuring alignment with goals.
applicability_notes: Applicable to any endeavor where performance and outcome assessment are necessary.
examples_of_usage: Measuring user adoption of a new feature

name: Map Project Dependencies
description: Identify and document the relationships and interdependencies between different tasks, resources, or components required for the 'Porn projects'.
purpose: Visualizes the project's structure and flow, enabling better resource allocation, scheduling, and risk identification.
applicability_notes: Vital for complex projects with multiple interconnected parts.
